title: LP - Gain ~ Loss
body: Im really curious to know what happened to the LP gain/loss system before patch 5.9 I was gaining 30 LP per win and losing about 7 per loss, but now it takes 3 wins to every 1 loss to actually climb, from 30/7 gain/loss to 14/27 gain loss why is the gain/loss messed up after the patch?

replies.body:
I know what happened..




You got bad sonny jim jams

What? 
Getting bad can't be tallied.

It's a condition cousin.
Sorry.

Not 4 times in a row, he just appears everywhere, and some of these games cant be helped, eg the jg is afk whole enemy team is up near baron, so they decide to try kill it, so enemy gets triple baron and takes most of our towers. Just because they were greedy

Lel. Wut?

Not sure I've seen someone miss the point so well.
I don't like points, ik what your saying, but I dont like points
"Your MMR is below the average" and also what rank are you duoing with?

it was fine before the patch, and I only had 2 duo with another person in exact same rank. You cant trust the bs op.gg makes up, I stopped when it said shaclone had below average 1376 mmr and faker had 1457

You're right, you cant trust what op.gg says. But the fact you're losing way more than you win means that your mmr IS low. I also find it incredibly hard to believe you were gaining 30 and losing 7 when your winrate is only about 50%, if anything thats the messed up numbers, not what you're getting now.
it was 69% then I had the same person 3 games in a row for promos, I should of dodged but dodging Is auto loss. and it went down from there
